attributes.action: Bring CARER'S ALLOWANCE SUPPLEMENT to the whole of the UK
attributes.additional_details: All carers are underpaid and a twice yearly payment would help so much.  It is already offered in Scotland and it should be uk wide not just for the Scottish.
attributes.background: Bring in a twice yearly payment for people claiming carers allowance in the UK the same as given in scotland with the Scottish carers supplement

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587893
